page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF DARREN
page.content: A typical day in my life usually begins at 8.00a.m. I get dressed in my school clothes and go down for breakfast.I usually have rice crispies.I go up for my friend and we leave his house at about 8.45am. The bell rings at 9.00am.We read our library books until we start work about 9.30a.m.We get Maths English and Writing.Our interval is at twenty to eleven.We stop for lunch at 12.30pm and I play on the computer all interval.We go in at 1.30p.m. Our afternoon interval is at 2.50p.m.and we come back in at 3.00p.m.When I get home at 3.30p.m. I have a cup of juice and a cake and then I get changed. I do my homework and go out to play snooker with my friend.We play levo. Levo is easy to play.I go in home at 9.15p.m,and have my supper at 9.30 pm.I go to bed at 10 o'clock.
